short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presenting a browser extension for YouTube that reimagines the user experience, making it purpose-driven, direct and minimal.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine a YouTube where you could always get exactly what you needed, nothing more, nothing less! Welcome to flowstate.cc! 

Transform your YouTube experience with features that help you:
• Customize recommendations / searches to exclude distractions (e.g., clickbaits, shorts etc.)
• Convert vague goals into specific search terms via a chatbot and stack up videos upfront

We are currently running an open beta program where we offer the product to you for free, in exchange for your valuable feedback and support! Join us on our mission to revolutionize digital media consumption and eradicate mindless scrolling!
